name: OrbIndicatorsRevisited
description: This was bound to happen sooner or later.

slightlyMoreHelpfulOrbIndicatorsRESET.name: Better Green Orb + Black Orb Indicators (READ THE DESC PLEASE!)
slightlyMoreHelpfulOrbIndicatorsRESET.description:
<cp>***__RESTART REQUIRED.</c>__***
- ***__<c_>CHANGES FROM THIS SETTING MAY INADVERTENTLY OVERRIDE BLENDING OPTIONS FOR GRADIENT/GLOW OBEJCTS.</c>__***
- ***__<cp>CHANGES FROM THIS SETTING MAY OVERRIDE, OR BE OVERRIDDEN BY CHANGES FROM LOADED TEXTURE PACKS.</c>__***

Uses slightly more descriptive orb indicators for green orbs and black orbs.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
